meta.name: viewport
meta.title: Camp Verde Unified School District – Home of the Cowboys

link.title: Camp Verde Unified School District » Feed
Camp Verde Unified School District » iCal Feed

body.class: home page-template-default page page-id-10 page-parent pl-scheme-default tribe-no-js pl-framework logged-out pl-platform plv-free

li.a: Phillip England Center for the Performing Arts
Phillip England Center for the Performing Arts

img.data-bind: visible: logo(), plimg: logo, style: {'height': logo_height() ? logo_height() + 'vw' : '50px', 'min-height': logo_height_min() ? logo_height_min() + 'px' : '30px'}

div.data-bind: css: { 'no-nav': ! menu() }, plattr: {'data-megas': megamenus, 'data-dropleft': dropleft, 'data-showsub': mobile_sub}

div.div: We have updated our web sites.
Use the link below to go to the new Camp Verde Schools web site.

img.data-bind: plimg: image, attr: {alt: alt, title: alt}, style: {'height': height() ? height() + 'vw' : '', 'width': width() ? width() + 'vw' : ''}
visible: logo(), plimg: logo, style: {'height': logo_height() ? logo_height() + 'vw' : '50px', 'min-height': logo_height_min() ? logo_height_min() + 'px' : '30px'}

div.data-bind: css: { 'no-nav': ! menu() }, plattr: {'data-megas': megamenus, 'data-dropleft': dropleft, 'data-showsub': mobile_sub}

span.data-bind: class: 'media-'+$root.ibox_media(), style: { color: color, width: 'image' == $root.ibox_media() ? $root.image_width() + 'px' : '' , opacity: $root.image_opacity}
